experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Overview: Developed logistics trackers to facilitate efficient inventory management for the Health-tech start-up and diagnostic laboratoryâ€¢ Built 2 live dashboards using PostgreSQL to monitor real-time inventory by integrating the supplier database with the company's dataâ€¢ Highlighted 3 key synergy issues by identifying discrepancies between supply and consumer demand for many of the medical types of equipmentâ€¢ Provided important insights from dashboards and suggested 2 recommendations that will be used in a decrement in total inventory costs
experience.description_html: Overview: Developed logistics trackers to facilitate efficient inventory management for the Health-tech start-up and diagnostic laboratoryâ€¢ Built 2 live dashboards using PostgreSQL to monitor real-time inventory by integrating the supplier database with the company's dataâ€¢ Highlighted 3 key synergy issues by identifying discrepancies between supply and consumer demand for many of the medical types of equipmentâ€¢ Provided important insights from dashboards and suggested 2 recommendations that will be used in a decrement in total inventory costs

experience.title: Machine Learning and Data Analysis Intern
experience.description: Overview: Worked on a pilot project with an Indian Electric Utility which can allow users to pay electric bills online using a mobile appâ€¢ Developed a Learning model to detect digits from the readings of electric meter images by analyzing 10,000+ images of electric metersâ€¢ Implemented Seven Segment method to classify digits from the meter readings and achieved 78% accuracy on the testing images dataâ€¢ Labelled training images and trained a custom YOLOv3 and YOLOv4 models for 1,000+ iterations with 10,000+ training images datasetâ€¢ Localized the part of the meter images data containing the required readings and achieved good accuracy of 0.86 mAp from the model
experience.description_html: Overview: Worked on a pilot project with an Indian Electric Utility which can allow users to pay electric bills online using a mobile appâ€¢ Developed a Learning model to detect digits from the readings of electric meter images by analyzing 10,000+ images of electric metersâ€¢ Implemented Seven Segment method to classify digits from the meter readings and achieved 78% accuracy on the testing images dataâ€¢ Labelled training images and trained a custom YOLOv3 and YOLOv4 models for 1,000+ iterations with 10,000+ training images datasetâ€¢ Localized the part of the meter images data containing the required readings and achieved good accuracy of 0.86 mAp from the model

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Overview: Understood how different ideas like 'swaraj', 'swadeshi', and 'ahimsa' have emerged over time and in different places in Indiaâ€¢ Performed exploratory data analysis on historical text dataset containing over 0.3+ Million article titles using NLTK and gensim librariesâ€¢ Achieved f-score of 0.76 on a highly imbalanced dataset by implementing classification models to classify article titles into two categoriesâ€¢ Formulated a frequency-based trending word algorithm to find 1500+ trending words, phrases, and n-grams for any given place and yearâ€¢ Identified the most popular ideas in general public sentiment from 1800 - 1950 by constructing a similarity matrix using cosine similarity
experience.description_html: Overview: Understood how different ideas like 'swaraj', 'swadeshi', and 'ahimsa' have emerged over time and in different places in Indiaâ€¢ Performed exploratory data analysis on historical text dataset containing over 0.3+ Million article titles using NLTK and gensim librariesâ€¢ Achieved f-score of 0.76 on a highly imbalanced dataset by implementing classification models to classify article titles into two categoriesâ€¢ Formulated a frequency-based trending word algorithm to find 1500+ trending words, phrases, and n-grams for any given place and yearâ€¢ Identified the most popular ideas in general public sentiment from 1800 - 1950 by constructing a similarity matrix using cosine similarity
